note.para: 强烈建议在一台独立的测试主机上先进行升级测试。

The database migration from OTRS 5 to 6 performs significant changes to database tables and data. Please make sure that there is enough storage space available for these operations (it might be worth considering to temporarily turn off archive/binary logs for the migration).

varlistentry.term: Updating from an earlier version of OTRS 6

listitem.para: You can update directly from any previous to the latest available patch level release.
You can update from any OTRS 5 patch level to the latest available OTRS 6 patch level release.

warning.para: You cannot update from OTRS 4 or earlier directly to OTRS 6. Full updates to all available minor versions have to be made sequentially instead. For example, if you come from OTRS 3.0, you first have to perform a full update to OTRS 3.1, then to 3.2, 3.3, 4, 5 and finally to OTRS 6.

section.title: 步骤1：停止所有相关服务和OTRS守护进程
section.para: 请确保没有任何运行中的服务或CRON计划任务还在试图访问OTRS。取决于你的服务配置，下面是一个例子：

para.screen: root> /etc/init.d/cron stop root> /etc/init.d/postfix stop root> /etc/init.d/apache stop

section.para: 停止OTRS cron任务和守护进程（按此顺序）：

para.screen: otrs> cd /opt/otrs/ otrs> bin/Cron.sh stop otrs> bin/otrs.Daemon.pl stop

section.title: 步骤2：备份文件和数据库

warning.para: 如果没有系统的完整备份，请不要继续。

section.title: 步骤3：安装新版本（tar包或RPM包）
步骤3.1：使用tar包：
section.screen: root> cd /opt root> mv otrs otrs-old root> tar -xzf otrs-x.x.x.tar.gz root> mv otrs-x.x.x otrs

section.title: 恢复工单数据
section.para: If you configured OTRS to store article data in the file system you have to restore the article folder to /opt/otrs/var/ or the folder specified in the System Configuration.

section.title: 恢复已安装的默认统计
section.para: 如果你有其他包含默认统计，则必须将后缀为*.installed的统计xml文件恢复到/opt/otrs/var/stats。

section.title: 设置文件权限
section.para: 请以root用户身份执行以下命令，以设置OTRS的文件和目录权限。 它将尝试检测你的安装所需的正确的用户和组设置。

section.title: 步骤3.2：使用RPM包：
section.para: 在这种情况下通过RPM升级会自动恢复原配置文件并设置文件权限。

section.title: 步骤4：运行迁移脚本

note.para: If you have any custom Perl or XML configuration files in Kernel/Config/Files, these need to be converted to the new formats supported by OTRS 6 before running the migration script.

section.para: The migration script will perform many checks on your system and give you advice on how to install missing Perl modules etc., if that is required. If all checks succeeded, the necessary migration steps will be performed. Please also run this script in case of patch level updates.

note.para: The migration script will ask you to set a time zone for OTRS if needed. It is very important that you set the correct time zone (OTRSTimeZone) for data storage and keep it, otherwise date and time of data added after the update (tickets, articles, etc.) will be stored with a different time zone than your pre-existing data, leading to inconsistent output.
对于新系统，建议使用 UTC ，因为用户可以使用不同的个人时区来使用OTRS应用程序。 对于现有的已迁移系统，如果底层操作系统未配置为 UTC 或OTRS以前使用时间偏移，则应使用不同的 OTRSTimeZone 。

section.para: 运行迁移脚本（用otrs用户，而不是root用户）：

warning.para: 如果此脚本无法正常工作，请不要继续升级过程。 否则可能会发生故障或丢失数据。

section.title: Step 5: Update installed packages

note.para: OTRS 5的软件包与OTRS 6不兼容，必须进行更新。

section.para: You can use the command below to update all installed packages. This works for all packages that are available from online repositories. You can update other packages later via the package manager (this requires a running OTRS Daemon).

section.title: Step 6: Restart your services
section.para: 这将取决于你的服务配置，这里是一个例子：

para.screen: root> /etc/init.d/apache start root> /etc/init.d/postfix start root> /etc/init.d/cron start

note.para: The OTRS Daemon is required for correct operation of OTRS such as sending emails. Please activate it as described in the next step.

section.title: 步骤7：启动OTRS守护进程和cron任务
section.para: The OTRS Daemon is responsible for handling any asynchronous and recurring tasks in OTRS. The daemon and its keepalive cron job must be started as the otrs user.

para.screen: otrs> cd /opt/otrs/ otrs> bin/otrs.Daemon.pl start otrs> bin/Cron.sh start

section.para: 现有你可以登录到系统了。
